actionCalls.description: Calls an invocable action to book the appointment for a standard or credentialed Experience Cloud user and stores the new service appointment ID in ServiceAppointment.
actionCalls.name: SaveAppointment
actionCalls.label: Save Appointment

actionCalls.description: Calls an invocable action to book the appointment for a guest Experience Cloud user and stores the new service appointment ID in ServiceAppointment.
actionCalls.name: SaveGuestAppointment
actionCalls.label: Save Guest Appointment

assignments.description: Sets ValidationErrors to "Error in Get Records."
assignments.name: Fault_Message
assignments.label: Fault Message

assignments.description: Sets attributes for the GuestLead record variable to null.
assignments.name: InitializeGuestLead
assignments.label: Initialize GuestLead

assignments.description: Sets the ServiceAppointment record variable's parent record ID to the parentRecordId passed into the flow. Sets other Service Appointment attributes to null.
assignments.name: InitializeServiceAppointment
assignments.label: Initialize ServiceAppointment

assignments.description: Sets the Company field for LeadGuest to the DefaultCompanyValue constant.
assignments.name: SetLeadGuestCompanyToDefault
assignments.label: Set LeadGuest Company to Default

assignments.description: Set the flow's current stage to the GuestUserStage
assignments.name: SetStageToGuest
assignments.label: Set Stage to Guest

assignments.description: Sets the flow's current stage to the InvitationStage.
assignments.name: SetStageToInvitatioin
assignments.label: Set Stage to Invitation

assignments.description: This will populate the fault message from Get Appointment Invitation action. The validation is fed to the confirmation screen.
assignments.name: SetValidationErrors
assignments.label: Set Validation Errors

constants.description: Stores the default value for GuestLead's company name. The default value is "Not Provided".
constants.name: DefaultCompanyValue

decisions.description: Determines whether the appointment invitation topic type is WorkTypeGroup or WorkType. Depending on the type, set the appropriate variable.
decisions.name: CheckAppointmentInvitationTopicType
decisions.label: What Type of Topic?

decisions.description: Determines whether the GuestLead has a value for the Company field.
decisions.name: DoesGuestHaveAssociatedCompany
decisions.label: Does Guest Have Associated Company?

decisions.description: Determines whether the invitation key format is valid.
decisions.name: IsInvitationKeyFormatValid
decisions.label: Is Invitation Key Format Valid?

decisions.description: Determines whether the invitation is active or expired.
decisions.name: IsInvitationValid
decisions.label: Is Invitation Valid?

decisions.description: Determines whether the user is a guest user, a standard user, or a credentialed Experience cloud user.
decisions.name: WhatTypeUser
decisions.label: What Type of User?

formulas.description: Define the error message type to be shown on the screen. This formula will validate the invitation record.
formulas.name: ErrorMessageType

formulas.description: Compares the invitation key to a valid invitation key format and returns True if it matches.
formulas.name: InvitationKeyRegex

formulas.description: Gets the contact ID of the credentialed Experience Cloud user running the flow.
formulas.name: UserContactId

recordCreates.description: Creates a lead record with the company, email, first name, last name, and phone stored in GuestUser and stores the new lead ID in GuestUser.
recordCreates.name: CreateLead
recordCreates.label: Create Lead

recordLookups.description: Gets the active, unexpired appointment invitation with the invitation key specified as an input parameter when the flow is called.
recordLookups.name: GetAppointmentInvitation
recordLookups.label: Get Appointment Invitation

recordLookups.description: Gets the ID of the contact that matches the UserContactID of the credentialed Experience Cloud user and stores the associated account ID in the Service Appointment's parent record ID field.
recordLookups.name: GetContactRecord
recordLookups.label: Get Contact for Experience Cloud User

recordLookups.description: Get Work Type record if appointment invitation topic type is Work Type
recordLookups.name: GetWorkType
recordLookups.label: Get Work Type

screens.description: Appointment Confirmation Screen. This screen is displayed if the appointment is created successfully.
screens.name: Appointment_Conformation
screens.label: Appointment Conformation

screens.description: Allows the flow user who's a standard or credentialed Experience Cloud user to review the appointment settings and stores a JSON string containing the appointment fields in ServiceAppointmentFields.
screens.name: ScreenReviewAppointment
screens.label: Review Appointment

screens.description: Allows an Experience Cloud guest user to review the appointment settings and stores a JSON string containing the appointment fields in ServiceAppointmentFields.
screens.name: ScreenReviewGuestAppointment
screens.label: Review Guest Appointment

screens.description: Displays the time slots associated with the appointment invitation and stores the results in ServiceAppointment, ServiceResourceId, ServiceResources, and WorkTypeGroup. Stores validation errors in ValidationErrors.
screens.name: ScreenSelectAppointmentTimeSlot
screens.label: Set Appointment Time Slot

stages.description: Stores the label displayed to the flow user for the Guest
stages.name: GuestUserStage
stages.label: Review Guest Appointment

stages.description: Stores the label displayed to the flow user for the first stage on the flow screen progress indicator.
stages.name: InvitationStage
stages.label: Get Appointment Invitation

variables.description: Stores the appointment invitation to book an appointment from.
variables.name: AppointmentInvitation

variables.description: This variable holds Appointment Invitation Id
variables.name: AppointmentInvitationId

variables.description: Stores information about a guest Experience Cloud user.
variables.name: GuestLead

variables.description: Stores the appointment invitation key specified as an input parameter when the flow is called.
variables.name: invitationKey

variables.description: This variable is set to true when there are participants present for a given appointment invitation.
variables.name: IsParticipantPresent

variables.description: Stores the ID of the account, opportunity, or lead record that's specified as an input parameter when the flow is called. This record is a parent record for the service appointment.
variables.name: parentRecordId

variables.description: Stores the service appointment to be booked.
variables.name: ServiceAppointment

variables.description: Stores a JSON string containing the field-value pairs for a service appointment.
variables.name: ServiceAppointmentFields

variables.description: Stores the ID of the required (multi-resource scheduling not enabled) or the primary (multi-resource scheduling enabled) service resource for the appointment booking.
variables.name: ServiceResourceId

variables.description: Stores information about additional service resources from the appointment invitation in JSON format when multi-resource scheduling is enabled.
variables.name: ServiceResources

variables.description: Status Catagory of the message we want to display on the final screen.
variables.name: StatusCatagory

variables.description: Stores a string when the invitation key has an invalid format, when the appointment invitation can't be found, or when there's no Contact ID for the currently user. Stores a JSON string if an error occurs in ScreenSelectAppointmentTimeSlot, ScreenReviewGuestAppointment, or ScreenReviewAppointment.
variables.name: ValidationErrors

variables.description: This flow variable holds the Work Type used in the time slot screen to calculate availability.
variables.name: WorkType

variables.description: Stores the ID of the work type group (appointment topic) that ComponentSelectAppointmentTimeSlot uses to calculate appointment availability.
variables.name: WorkTypeGroupId
